A MODERN, SPACIOUS & PERFECTLY POSITIONED TOWNHOUSE
Cleverly designed to maximize light and space with sparkling flooring that reflects the suns natural glow, this executive style townhouse delivers all the comforts required for easy lifestyle living. Ultra-modern, low maintenance living and privacy are hallmarks of this trendsetting residence, which presents investors, owner occupiers, young professionals,
growing families, downsizers and first homebuyers with a sophisticated sense of living. The home's stylish attributes are evident in the beautiful high ceilings, stunning open-plan layout that's the epitome of contemporary design.
Positioned for privacy, the home opens to reveal a magnificent open plan living, dining and kitchen zone, resting beneath towering high ceilings and highlighted by stone benches, quality European stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, soft close drawers plus a convenient island breakfast bench. Glass sliding doors create a seamless indoor-outdoor connection flowing onto a spacious entertainers' paved and private patio. Three bedrooms are zoned in privacy upstairs, spacious master bedroom with an ensuite and walk-in robe, two more generous sized bedrooms with built-in robes, plus modern central bathroom featuring floor-to-ceiling tiling. While a discrete powder room and separate laundry with dryer provide additional downstairs convenience. Central ducted heating and cooling, remote control double lock up garage equipped with custom fitted storage systems and internal access, mobile & remote video surveillance camera systems, water tank and quality fixtures and fittings adds further appeal. If you're the type of person who loves being at the centre of it all, a dream location 2mins walk to Westall Train Station. Within close proximity of Springvale Homemaker Centre, Westall Secondary College & Primary School, scenic parks, public transportations, and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centre, you will not find a better growth location!
